gallery_help_us.description: Help us to make this application better!
gallery_help_us.message: Help us to make this application better!

gallery_privacy_browsing_history.description: - we do NOT store your browsing history! Although access to the chrome.tabs API is required, the application will never look or save your history. Please read http://code.google.com/chrome/extensions/permission_warnings.html#warnings for more information.
gallery_privacy_browsing_history.message: - we do NOT store your browsing history! Although access to the chrome.tabs API is required, the application will never look or save your history. Please read http://code.google.com/chrome/extensions/permission_warnings.html#warnings for more information.

gallery_privacy_personal_data.description: - we do NOT send any data to any third party servers.
gallery_privacy_personal_data.message: - we do NOT send any data to any third party servers.

gallery_weather_app_features_geolocation.description: - Instant geolocation and localization: get forecasts in your language
gallery_weather_app_features_geolocation.message: - Instant geolocation and localization: get forecasts in your language

gallery_weather_app_features_manage_favo.description: - Quick access to your favorite places
gallery_weather_app_features_manage_favo.message: - Quick access to your favorite places

gallery_weather_app_features_notificatio.description: - Real time notifications on weather changes
gallery_weather_app_features_notificatio.message: - Real time notifications on weather changes

search_city_input_placeholder.description: Enter a city or zip code (default text in the search box)
search_city_input_placeholder.message: Enter a city or zip code

weather_app_description.description: This application geolocates you and displays in one click your favorite location weather forecasts.
weather_app_description.message: This application geolocates you and displays in one click your favorite location weather forecasts.

weather_gallery_description.message: The Weather application will automatically geolocate you when installing, and display the closest city weather forecast. A browser icon indicates the daily forecast and temperature.

weather_notifications_forecast_label.description: display notification on weather forecast change (checkbox)
weather_notifications_forecast_label.message: display notification on weather forecast change

weather_notifications_present_label.description: display notification on daily weather updates (checkbox)
weather_notifications_present_label.message: display notification on daily weather updates

weather_present_updated_label.description: Weather of the day has been updated !
weather_present_updated_label.message: Weather of the day has been updated !
